formattedAddress: 3 W 57th St 2 Floor, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 3 W 57th St 2 Floor, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text: Had a great experience shopping here! The selection is huge, and all the team is so nice and helpful. I was assisted by Adrianne, she helped me pick out a beautiful coat. It was a little bit big in size, but there is also a wonderful gentleman there who did an alteration for me. I was able to pick up the coat in just a couple of days. Prices are also very good. Overall a wonderful personalized shopping experience!

originalText.text: I could walk in this store and never leave!! I came in looking for a fur for my wedding and they were so helpful and willing to meet every desire I had. I am walking out with a stunning monogrammed, ivory, fur coat that is just what I‚Äôve been looking for fur so long. I will definitely be coming back next year to add to my fur collection!

I am walking out with a stunning monogrammed, ivory, fur coat that is just what I‚Äôve been looking for fur so long. I will definitely be coming back next year to add to my fur collection!

originalText.text: I recently had a wonderful experience at Fur Source, thanks to Adriane's exceptional service. Her warm and attentive approach created a welcoming atmosphere in the store. Adriane took the time to ensure we felt comfortable, and provided assistance with much love and care!

text.text: I recently had a wonderful experience at Fur Source, thanks to Adriane's exceptional service. Her warm and attentive approach created a welcoming atmosphere in the store. Adriane took the time to ensure we felt comfortable, and provided assistance with much love and care!

originalText.text: We walked in off the street and we were very warmly met by Adriana who treated us as if we were family.  She sized up my wife and brought her about 4 or 5 incredible fur coats.  Originally I was not planning on purchasing a fur, but walked out after a 2nd visit for a fitting buying a second coat. My wife looks beautiful in both the coats and loved them. I highly recommend them for any of your fur needs.

Originally I was not planning on purchasing a fur, but walked out after a 2nd visit for a fitting buying a second coat. My wife looks beautiful in both the coats and loved them. originalText.text:
I first came upon The Fur Source last year around this same time. Although they didn‚Äôt have a product that I found to be the right fit, I knew I would be back. Their service is beyond compare, which is something lacking from most companies and their employees these days.
From my sales rep Maciek, his brother Hugo, and the owner, Peter, everyone had only one objective and that was to find a coat I loved. This year they exceeded my expectations.
If you‚Äôre looking for something special at an incredible price, I would highly recommend The Fur Source.
Be sure to say hello to Maciek for me. üòâ
Five Stars all around ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è!
